verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּֽעֲל֗וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees לִשְׁלֹ֫מֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> for Solomon אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> Except the LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִבְנֶ֬ה <S%H1129><s%> build בַ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house שָׁ֤וְא ׀ <S%H7723><s%> in vain עָמְל֣וּ <S%H5998><s%> they labour בוֹנָ֣יו <S%H1129><s%> that build בּ֑וֹ אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> it except the LORD לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִשְׁמָר־ <S%H8104><s%> keep עִ֝֗יר <S%H5892><s%> the city שָׁ֤וְא ׀ <S%H7723><s%> [but] in vain שָׁקַ֬ד <S%H8245><s%> waketh שׁוֹמֵֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> the watchman

שָׁ֤וְא <S%H7723><s%> [It is] vain לָכֶ֨ם ׀ מַשְׁכִּ֪ימֵי <S%H7925><s%> early ק֡וּם <S%H6965><s%> for you to rise up מְאַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H309><s%> late שֶׁ֗בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to sit up אֹ֭כְלֵי <S%H398><s%> to eat לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> the bread הָעֲצָבִ֑ים <S%H6089><s%> of sorrows כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> [for] so he giveth לִֽידִיד֣וֹ <S%H3039><s%> his beloved שֵׁנָֽא׃ <S%H8142><s%> sleep

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold נַחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> [are] an heritage יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> Lo children שָׂ֝כָ֗ר <S%H7939><s%> [is his] reward פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> [and] the fruit הַבָּֽטֶן׃ <S%H990><s%> of the womb

כְּחִצִּ֥ים <S%H2671><s%> As arrows בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> [are] in the hand גִּבּ֑וֹר <S%H1368><s%> of a mighty man כֵּ֝֗ן <S%H3651><s%> So בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> so [are] children הַנְּעוּרִֽים׃ <S%H5271><s%> of the youth

אַשְׁרֵ֤י <S%H835><s%> Happy הַגֶּ֗בֶר <S%H1397><s%> [is] the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whose מִלֵּ֥א <S%H4390><s%> full אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַשְׁפָּת֗וֹ <S%H827><s%> that hath his quiver מֵ֫הֶ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> like לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> of them they shall not be ashamed כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יְדַבְּר֖וּ <S%H1696><s%> but they shall speak אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אוֹיְבִ֣ים <S%H341><s%> with the enemies בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ <S%H8179><s%> in the gate
